content: type of instructions - written instructions - english only and us crochet terminology used - visual help included - no charts - paid version only - multiples included - paid version only skill level - you must know how to read a crochet pattern - you must know basic crochet stitches - chain single_crochet skip double_crochet etc - you must know how to skip stitches - you must know how to follow instructions - best for advanced beginners to intermediate crocheters finished size - 25 78 x 26 29 inches approx yarn & hook - any aran yarn yarn brand included in the pattern - 5mm crochet hook - yards included for main part of the blanket - no yards given for border as scrap yarn was used terms of use - for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy - all digital sales are final about truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet patterns this version on etsy is an ad-free pdf version of my free pattern
